  • Conhecimento Especializado: • Domínio das melhores práticas, funcionalidades e limitações do Salesforce, garantindo a implementação eficaz e eficiente das soluções.
  • Habilidades Técnicas: • Proficiência em Salesforce Lightning, APEX, Trigger e App Builder, com experiência prática no desenvolvimento de soluções personalizadas, além dos aceleradores do pacote de OmniStudio (Integration Procedure, Omni Script, Data Mapper e Flex Card 6. Controle de Versão: Familiaridade com o controle de versão usando Git, facilitando a colaboração e o gerenciamento de código entre a equipe de desenvolvimento. Modelagem de Fluxos de Negócio:
  • Capacidade de modelar fluxos de negócio para traduzir requisitos de negócio em soluções técnicas eficazes dentro do Salesforce. 8. Metodologias Ágeis:
  • Conhecimentos avançados em metodologias ágeis, permitindo uma abordagem iterativa e colaborativa no desenvolvimento de soluções Salesforce.
  • Certificações: • Preferencialmente certificado Salesforce Certified Platform Developer I, OmniStudio Developer demonstrando competência no desenvolvimento de soluções na plataforma Salesforce. • Certificações adicionais, como Salesforce Certified Administrator e Salesforce Certified Platform Developer II, são consideradas diferenciais, indicando um nível mais avançado de habilidades e conhecimentos.

Requisitos e Qualificações:

  • Experiência com OmniStudio, aplicando aceleradores prontos para uso e personalizando-os para as necessidades da indústria de energia e serviços públicos;
  • Conhecimento em Business Rule Engine (BRE) para otimização de regras de negócios e processos de precificação complexos;
  • Experiência com Orchestration Management (OM), incluindo decomposição de pedidos e desenvolvimento de planos de orquestração para processos complexos e multi-step;
  • Conhecimento em Contract Lifecycle Management (CLM) será considerado um diferencial, especialmente para gerenciar contratos ao longo de seu ciclo de vida, da criação à renovação e fechamento;


Descrição comportamental:

Procuramos uma pessoa que:

  • Goste de trabalhar em equipe e seja colaborativa em suas atribuições;
  • Tenha coragem para se desafiar e ir além, abraçando novas oportunidades de crescimento;
  • Transforme ideias em soluções criativas e busque qualidade em toda sua rotina;
  • Tenha habilidades de resolução de problemas ;
  • Possua habilidade e se sinta confortável para trabalhar de forma independente e gerenciar o próprio tempo ;
  • Tenha interesse em lidar com situações adversas e inovadoras no âmbito tecnológico.


O que oferecemos:


Cartão multi-benefícios – você escolhe como e onde utilizar;

Bolsas de Estudos para cursos de Graduação, Pós, MBA e Idiomas;

Programas de incentivo à Certificações;

title: Machine Learning Engineer | Sponsor US H1B
description:
Project Overview:

We are seeking a highly skilled and versatile Machine Learning and Data Engineer to join our team. This role involves developing sophisticated image-based solutions for plant phenotyping and pulling, stitching, and wrangling data from various sources for advanced analytics. The successful candidate will work on a cross-functional team, collaborating closely with crop scientists, plant pathologists, cloud engineers, and data scientists to enable access to relevant data and deploy machine-learning models and solutions.


Responsibilities:

  • Develop and implement image-based solutions for quantifying various traits and features of plants.
  • Pull data from first and third-party sources, prepare it for analysis by filtering, tagging, joining, parsing, and normalizing datasets.
  • Collaborate with team members to research data sources, design and deploy data loaders, and ensure the availability of data for analytical activities.
  • Provide technical expertise in the design and implementation of data management and architecture solutions.
  • Develop, evolve, and implement concepts of data ops in partnership with cloud and ML engineers.
  • Architect, develop, deliver, and support ML products and solutions, ensuring successful deployment into production.
  • Automate model training, testing, and deployment processes.
  • Design, develop, and maintain scalable data pipelines and ETL processes.


Requirements:

  • Master’s degree or higher in Data Science, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Robotics, Physics, Mathematics, or related fields.
  • Deep understanding and experience with Image Theory, Deep Learning, Machine Learning, Python Programming, TensorFlow, or PyTorch.
  • Strong experience in designing and implementing large-scale data processing, analysis, and exploration solutions.
  • Proficiency in R, Python, advanced SQL skills, and a good understanding of data management principles.
  • Experience with cloud technologies (Azure or GCP preferred) and deploying CI/CD pipelines.
  • Knowledge of Git, PySpark, Data Bricks, and database management (SQL/PLSQL/Snowflake preferred).
  • Excellent communication skills and the ability to work independently and collaborate across teams.
  • 2+ years of industry or academia experience in image processing, computer vision, or related fields.


Work Details:

  • Location: Remote, candidates must work in the PST time zone.
  • Work Hours: 40 hours per week.
  • We sponsor US work visa after 1 year of service

title: Job Classification Specialist
description:
Job Type: Part-time (up to 30 hours/week)

Salary: $9/hr

Start Date: Immediate


Job Description:

iSoftStone is seeking detail-oriented individuals to review and categorize job postings based on their skill level. You’ll read job titles and descriptions to understand the work involved and assign an appropriate skill level. This role involves some research to clarify job details and ensuring accurate labeling of job postings.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Review job postings to determine and assign the correct skill level.
  • Research job details online to better understand roles and requirements.
  • Identify postings that don’t fit the criteria and provide reasons for skipping them.
  • Add comments or flag postings that are unclear or borderline cases.


Qualifications:

  • Strong attention to detail and ability to analyze job descriptions.
  • Basic research skills to clarify job roles using online resources.
  • Fluency in Portuguese from Brazil.
  • Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
  • Prior experience with job market research or data annotation is a plus but not required.


Application Process:

Submit your resume for consideration. Selected candidates will attend a one-time meeting call before starting.

title: Profissional Analista de Testes – Automação e Manual
description:
Código da vaga: 47391


Sobre a BRQ Digital

Há 32 anos no mercado, a BRQ Digital Solutions se consolidou como uma das maiores empresas de transformação digital do país. Com uma plataforma de serviços end to end, oferecemos as mais eficientes e inovadoras soluções, tecnologias e metodologias, promovendo uma jornada de transformação para grandes marcas, de diferentes segmentos, no Brasil e no exterior.

Nossos 2.500 mil funcionários atuam no modelo de trabalho Anywhere Office e a empresa é destaque como um dos melhores lugares para trabalhar pelo GPTW e Glassdoor.


BRQ WAY

No nosso BRQ WAY temos a missão de conectar, transformar e empoderar cada um dos nossos profissionais, que por aqui são chamados de feras, para que todos tenham a chance de usar sua paixão para transformar o mundo com tecnologia! É isso que queremos, com nosso Programa de Diversidade e Inclusão trabalhamos com dois objetivos: equidade e inclusão, buscamos aumentar a participação dos grupos minoritários, quebrar os vieses inconscientes e expandir a conscientização sobre temas tão importantes para que todos sejam livres para serem quem são.

Vamos transformar juntos! Vem ser fera com a gente.



  • Ei, profissional QA , venha fazer parte de uma das maiores empresas de transformação digital do país!


O que procuramos?

Buscamos um #fera com espírito empreendedor e que sabe que é o verdadeiro protagonista do seu sucesso! Queremos em nosso time pessoas motivadas por desafios, constante evolução e, claro, que são apaixonadas por tecnologia e transformação!


- O que você deve ter?

  • Automação de Testes:
  • Cypress
  • Robot Framework
  • Testes Manuais:
  • Elaboração e execução de casos de teste manuais para aplicações web
  • Reporte e acompanhamento de bugs via Jira
  • Linguagem de Programação:
  • Java 8 (para apoio no desenvolvimento de scripts de testes automatizados)
  • Ambientes e Ferramentas:
  • Servidor de Aplicação: WebLogic
  • Banco de Dados: Oracle
  • Integração com soluções Web

Responsabilidades:

  • Atuar no desenvolvimento e execução de testes automatizados e manuais em aplicações web
  • Validar requisitos funcionais e não funcionais
  • Garantir a qualidade das entregas junto ao time de desenvolvimento
  • Documentar e reportar evidências de testes
  • Colaborar com equipes ágeis, contribuindo para a melhoria contínua do processo de QA



Modelo 100% home office

CLT pela BRQ + Pacote de benefícios


- O que temos pra te oferecer?

Mais do que um plano de carreira !


A BRQ acredita que cada fera deve ser protagonista do seu crescimento, tendo autonomia para criar seu próprio plano de desenvolvimento profissional. Nosso plano de carreira é dividido em 4 pilares:


Carreira técnica: Você pode seguir a trilha de crescimento técnico, se o seu objetivo for se desenvolver cada vez mais em diferentes tecnologias. Oferecemos diversos treinamentos!

Carreira de Liderança: Você pode seguir a trilha e se tornar um líder, desenvolver pessoas, auxiliar na evolução profissional e pessoal e estimular o crescimento para o surgimento de novos talentos.

Experiência internacional: Estamos crescendo cada vez mais fora do Brasil e você tem possibilidade de atuar em projetos para outros países, ou diretamente nos países onde a BRQ tem sede.

Empreendedorismo: De funcionário para sócio! Temos o Innovation Hub, a Corporate Venture que investe em ideias de profissionais que tenham sinergia com nosso negócio.


- E os benefícios?

Plano de Saúde; Plano Odontológico; Seguro de Vida; Vale Refeição; Vale Alimentação; Horário Flexível; Home Office; Gympass, Telemedicina, Telenutrição, Canal de suporte emocional 24h e muito mais!


- Como é trabalhar na BRQ?

Temos um clima descontraído, diversos programas e eventos internos. Adoramos comemorar! E fazemos isso muito bem! Veja aqui no Youtube: youtube.com/brqdigitalsolutions

title: Product Owner Senior (PO)
description:
Olá, somos a SuperFrete :)


Queremos ser a maior e mais amada rede de logística digital, quer fazer parte disso?

Somos uma startup que atua no segmento do varejo e logística, apoiando os pequenos e médios empreendedores a se tornarem mais competitivos no mercado e a alavancarem suas vendas. Por isso, buscamos um(a) Super Product Owner Senior (PO) , que se identifique com o nosso propósito, que tenha muita energia para somar no time de Produtos e que queria crescer (muito!) com a gente.

Requisitos:

  • Habilidades para priorização de backlog;
  • Conhecimento e habilidade com o Jira;

  • Conhecimento e habilidade em Delivery;

Diferenciais:

O que você pode esperar dos Supers?

  • Temos vontade de construir junto, fazer a diferença e gerar impacto.

title: Financial Sr Analyst (USD - Remote)
description:
Location: Remote

Working hours: Full Time


Reports to: Finance Lead



Overview

We are looking for a highly analytical and detail-oriented Financial Analyst to join a fast-growing, remote-first consumer goods company in the pet industry. This is an individual contributor role focused on building and refining Excel-based financial models and analytics. You will work directly with the Finance team supporting the entire organization (sales, marketing and operations). The role is ideal for someone who enjoys getting deep into data, spotting trends, forecasting ahead and creating the tools that support strategic decision-making.


Key Responsibilities

  • Build, maintain, and optimize Excel-based financial models , including sales forecasting by SKU, customer, and category.
  • Support budgeting and forecasting processes by analyzing past performance and future trends.
  • Prepare and refine custom templates to improve financial reporting and visibility.
  • Conduct deep-dive analyses to inform business decisions and highlight risks or opportunities.
  • Assist in financial data consolidation and participate in internal reporting discussions, including board presentations.
  • Help identify and implement process improvements and best practices across financial planning effort


Qualifications

  • 3–5 years of experience in FP&A, corporate finance, or financial analysis .
  • Strong proficiency in Microsoft Excel (pivot tables, complex formulas, data modeling).
  • Experience working with financial models (especially sales models or revenue forecasts).
  • Comfortable handling large datasets and working independently on complex problems.
  • Strong analytical mindset and a proactive approach to spotting discrepancies and improving models.
  • Excellent communication skills and the ability to provide insights to non-finance stakeholders.
  • Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics, or a related field.


Nice to Have

  • Experience in consumer goods (CPG) or e-commerce environments.
  • Familiarity with revenue modeling by SKU and category-level forecasting.
  • Exposure to financial reporting under IFRS or US GAAP .
  • Experience working in a remote-first team and managing asynchronous communication effectively.
  • Background in financial consulting or supporting board-level reporting .

title: Adaptive Packaging Designer for Global CPG Brand
description:
Overview:

We are seeking a Senior Adaptive Designer to support a global CPG brand with a packaging adaptation project . This role will focus on adapting global design templates for packaging in global markets while ensuring regional compliance, print accuracy, and multi-language requirements. The designer will work closely with internal teams, the repro agency, and print suppliers to maintain consistency and accuracy across a large number of SKUs and artworks.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Adapt global design templates to market-specific packaging needs, ensuring regional compliance.
  • Modify artwork for multi-language variants, SKU differentiation, and local market requirements.
  • Ensure print specifications, spot varnishes, color accuracy, and dielines are correctly applied.
  • Work within Adobe Illustrator to prepare high-quality, production-ready files.
  • Collaborate with regional marketing teams and packaging suppliers to implement changes efficiently.
  • Review files with production teams to ensure quality control before print.
  • Maintain organization of packaging files and templates for future adaptations.


Ideal Candidate Profile:

  • Experience with adaptive packaging design in global markets .
  • Expertise in Adobe Illustrator , including layered file management and print production workflows.
  • Prior experience with multi-language packaging , particularly text formatting and regional compliance.
  • Strong understanding of print production workflows , including collaboration with repro agencies , color management (PMS colors), and substrate layers .
  • Detail-oriented and proactive , ensuring designs meet print specifications while optimizing workflow efficiency.
  • Ability to work independently, meet deadlines, and collaborate across teams.
  • Attention to detail —ensuring precision in technical specifications.


Ideal Candidate Profile:

  • Highly technical with strong print and packaging experience.
  • Comfortable working in structured template-driven projects rather than conceptual design.
  • Familiar with global regulatory requirements for packaging design.
  • Self-motivated, detail-oriented, and proactive in problem-solving.


Work Structure & Next Steps:

Start Date: Late May/Early June

Duration: likely 8 weeks, with potential for extension based on project needs.

Time Commitment: Full-time

Communication: Primary collaboration via Teams, SharePoint, and Wrike.

title: C++ Development Analyst
description:
T-Systems, a German multinational company and part of the Deutsche Telekom Group, is seeking a Senior Architect with a good command of English to work 100% remotely.


Job Description

We are looking for a skilled C++ Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate is experienced in Agile methodologies, particularly Scrum, and has a strong background in automated and unit testing. A good command of English or German is essential for effective communication within our international team.


Requirements:

• Proficiency in C++

• Experience working in Agile environments (Scrum)

• Strong knowledge of automated and unit testing

• Good command of English or German


Nice to have:

• Experience with embedded systems

• Familiarity with version control systems, especially GIT


Come be Magenta!

title: Medical Science Liaison
description:
A Sun Pharma é a quarta maior empresa farmacêutica especializada em genéricos do mundo e a número 1 na Índia. Fornecemos medicamentos acessíveis e de alta qualidade, em que clientes e pacientes confiam em mais de 100 países. Presença global com 40 unidades fabris em 5 continentes, centros de P&D e uma força de trabalho multicultural composta por mais de 50 nacionalidades.

Estamos em busca dos melhores talentos para atuar no lançamento de produto biológico da linha dermatológica para tratamento da psoríase.


MSL


Responsabilidades:

Padronização do produto nas clínicas e centros de infusão.

Responsável pela fidelização da marca do produto junto aos principais médicos e clinicas.

Identificar oportunidades no setor para expansão e ganho de mercado do produto.

Responsável pela visitação aos principais stakeholders do setor.

Gestão das necessidades dos médicos visitados

Reforço da marca institucional e produto, visando ganho de Market Share e prescrição no setor


Requisitos:

Experiência com visitação medica em dermatologia.

Conhecimento do mercado Dermatológico e Psoríase.

Formação superior na área da saúde.


Residir NORDESTE ou MINAS GERAIS.

title: Facebook Page Care
description:
We need to recruit staff to take care of the facebook page system, the job is based on the management software from 5 pages to 10 pages

Your responsibility is to reply to messages and comments from customers and post daily on the page

We offer 500$ per hour

Send your CV to the company email address:

Best regards

LYFE Marketing,

title: Senior Backend Node.js Engineer
description:
Company Overview: Lean Tech is a rapidly expanding organization situated in Medellín, Colombia. We pride ourselves on possessing one of the most influential networks within software development and IT services for the entertainment, financial, and logistics sectors. Our corporate projections offer a multitude of opportunities for professionals to elevate their careers and experience substantial growth. Joining our team means engaging with expansive engineering teams across Latin America and the United States, contributing to cutting-edge developments in multiple industries. Currently, we are seeking a Senior Back End Developer with a strong English level to join our team. Here are the challenges that our next warrior will face and the requirements we look for:


Position Title: Senior Back End Node.js Developer

Location: LATAM - Remote



What you will be doing: The Senior Backend Developer will lead the development and optimization of scalable, secure backend systems using serverless AWS architecture. The role involves building and maintaining critical backend services, including APIs, databases, and microservices, while collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to deliver impactful solutions.

  • Design, develop, and maintain serverless backend systems using Node.js and various AWS services (Lambda, DynamoDB, ECS, RDS).
  • Implement and optimize microservices architecture to enhance scalability, performance, and reliability.
  • Perform software analysis, integration and unit testing, debugging and code enhancements ensuring code completion, routinely inspect code for optimization opportunities.
  • Support request within our ticketing systems to ensure the timely delivery of development and or processing of failed transactions.
  • Develop APIs (GraphQL) to support application features.
  • Leverage CI/CD pipelines practices to ensure efficient deployment and integration.
  • Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code while adhering to coding standards.
  • Troubleshoot, debug, and enhance application performance and stability.
  • Collaborate with frontend, DevOps, and other engineering teams to define and implement new features.
  • Stay updated on emerging technologies and contribute ideas to improve the tech stack.


Requirements & Qualifications:

  • Extensive experience as a Backend Developer, with a strong focus on Node.js and JavaScript.
  • Hands-on experience with AWS services, including Lambda, DynamoDB, API Gateway, ECS, S3, and RDS.
  • Strong understanding of serverless architecture, event-driven design, and microservices. (AWS Serverless Model, AWS Amplify and AWS Chalice)
  • Experience with both SQL and NoSQL databases.
  • Proficiency in version control tools (e.g. GitHub/GitLab).
  • Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and automation tools.
  • Experience with Terraform, Kubernetes, Docker, and CloudFormation.
  • Understanding of serverless identity management (AWS Cognito) and authentication/authorization practices.
  • Knowledge of modern software development methodologies (e.g., Agile, Waterfall).


Good to have:

  • Ability to work with frontend technologies like React.js is a plus.
  • Familiarity with TypeScript(1), Python(2), or Java(3) is a plus.
  • Experience with React development


Soft Skills:

  • Strong leadership abilities with excellent organizational and prioritization skills.
  • Outstanding communication and stakeholder management skills.
  • Ability to work independently as well as within a collaborative team environment.
  • Adaptable, proactive, and committed to continuous learning and improvement.


Why you will love Lean Tech:

  • Join a powerful tech workforce and help us change the world through technology.
  • Professional development opportunities with international customers.
  • Collaborative work environment.
  • Career path and mentorship programs that will lead to new levels.


Join Lean Tech and contribute to shaping the data landscape within a dynamic and growing organization. Your skills will be honed, and your contributions will be vital to our continued success. Lean Tech is an equal-opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

title: Desenvolvedor Back-End Sr .NET
description:
O Mercado Eletrônico é líder na América Latina em soluções de comércio eletrônico B2B. Suas tecnologias e serviços para as áreas de compras ajudam empresas a conquistarem mais economia, agilidade, governança e colaboração. Com escritórios no Brasil, Portugal, México e Estados Unidos, contabiliza mais de 1 milhão de fornecedores, 10 mil compradores e transaciona R$ 180 bilhões em negócios entre fornecedores e compradores. Para mais informações, acesse:


Desenvolvedor Back-End .NET Sr

Quais serão suas responsabilidades neste desafio?

Criar e desenvolver soluções escaláveis, sustentáveis e orientadas ao negócio;

Participar da construção de serviços, aplicativos e APIs com soluções baseadas em .Net;

Participar ativamente na elaboração das soluções;

Fazer parte de um time de alta performance e muita colaboração multidisciplinar.


Qualificações Exigidas:


Formação completa ou cursando em Eng./Ciências da Computação ou equivalente;

Ter experiência com C# (.NET / .NET Core).

Será considerado um grande diferencial ter conhecimento Java/Spring, assim como outras linguagens: Node.js, Python, Go, etc.;

Ter experiência criando arquiteturas resilientes e escaláveis;

Experiência com alguma plataforma Cloud (AWS, GCP, Azure, etc.);

Experiência com Docker e Kubernetes;

Experiência em Git e Jira;

Vivência em metodologia ágil;

Conhecimento em temas relacionados à DevOps: CI, CD, Monitoring e Observability;

Conhecimento em Streaming de dados e Mensageria com Kafka, RabbitMQ, etc.;

Conhecimento em bancos de dados relacionais e não-relacionais (MongoDB, ElasticSearch, Redis, etc.).


Você vai encontrar aqui:

▪ Contratação CLT;

▪ Onboarding de boas vindas;

▪ Ambiente dinâmico, diverso e inclusivo;

▪ Flexibilidade de horário, Home Office;

▪ WellHub (Gympass);

▪ Verba anual de incentivo educacional;

▪ Ótimos benefícios.

title: Técnico de Planejamento e Controle de Obras
description:
A TTS Energia é uma empresa especializada no desenvolvimento de soluções em energias renováveis em todo o território nacional, com o compromisso de tornar a energia fotovoltaica um negócio financeiramente viável - com previsibilidade, redução de custos e alinhado com as melhores práticas ESG.


Nossa empresa é certificada com o selo Great Place To Work® (GPTW), portanto, é um certificado muito importante para atestar a qualidade da empresa na gestão de pessoas e na cultura organizacional.



Vaga: Técnico de Planejamento e Controle de Obras


Requisitos:


  • Formação como técnico ou engenheiro (civil, eletricista ou produção)
  • Conhecimento avançado de MS Excel e MS Project
  • Experiência mínima de 3 anos em planejamento e controle de obras


Fatores preferenciais:


  • Noções básicas de Autocad;
  • Experiência em planejamento e controle obras de energia fotovoltaica;
  • Interpretação de projetos e especificações técnicas;
  • Conhecimentos em Gerenciamento de Projetos;
  • Ter conhecimentos no ERP Sienge;
  • Possuir veículo próprio.


Responsabilidades do Cargo:

  • Elaborar e acompanhar pacote completo de planejamento físico de obras : EAP, cronograma, curva S, programação de atividades, plano de ataque e análise de impacto;
  • Acompanhar cronogramas de terceiros e integrar com o planejamento geral;
  • Planejar e acompanhar recursos incluindo histogramas de mão de obra e equipamentos;
  • Antecipar necessidades logísticas e de suprimentos;
  • Elaborar e acompanhar pacote completo de planejamento financeiro de obras: controle de custos, fluxo de caixa, medições de clientes e fornecedores, registrar e justificar desvios financeiros;
  • Validar medições físicas junto às equipes técnicas;
  • Acompanhar a produtividade da mão de obra e frentes de serviço;
  • Monitorar o cumprimento de normas e procedimentos técnicos.
  • Identificar riscos e oportunidades com sugestão de plano de contingência;
  • Elaborar relatórios e indicadores de acompanhamento físico e financeiro;
  • Interface com as equipes envolvidas no projeto/obra;
  • Manter dashboards atualizados para a diretoria ou cliente;
  • Análise e levantamento quantitativo e qualitativo de projetos quando necessário.
  • Desenvolver outras atividades correlatas à função.


Local de trabalho:

• Holambra – SP


Condições de trabalho:

  • Salário a combinar de acordo com a experiência
  • Plano de saúde - sem desconto para titular
  • Plano Odontológico - sem desconto para titular
  • Auxílio alimentação
  • Auxílio transporte
  • TotalPass
  • Seguro de vida

  • Monitorar o cumprimento de normas e procedimentos técnicos.
  • Identificar riscos e oportunidades com sugestão de plano de contingência;
  • Elaborar relatórios e indicadores de acompanhamento físico e financeiro;
  • Interface com as equipes envolvidas no projeto/obra;
  • Manter dashboards atualizados para a diretoria ou cliente;
  • Análise e levantamento quantitativo e qualitativo de projetos quando necessário.
  • Desenvolver outras atividades correlatas à função.


Local de trabalho:

• Holambra – SP


Condições de trabalho:

  • Salário a combinar de acordo com a experiência
  • Plano de saúde - sem desconto para titular
  • Plano Odontológico - sem desconto para titular
  • Auxílio alimentação
  • Auxílio transporte
  • TotalPass
  • Seguro de vida

title: Ad Ops - CTV
description:
Responsibilities:

● Campaign QA and Validation: Ensure that all ad campaigns meet client specifications, including

proper setup of tracking URLs, targeting parameters, and creative assets, third-party Tags before

launch.

● Compliance and Error Checks: Conduct thorough checks for compliance with platform policies,

client-specific advertiser guidelines, and technical requirements to identify and rectify any errors.

● Performance Monitoring: Regularly monitor live campaigns to ensure accurate tracking, pacing, and delivery, addressing any discrepancies promptly.

● Documentation and Reporting: Maintain detailed QA reports, document findings, and provide

actionable insights to improve workflow efficiency and campaign accuracy.

● Process Optimization: Work closely with the trafficking, account management, and creative teams to streamline QA processes, minimize errors, and ensure seamless campaign execution.

● Creative Testing for CTV Devices: Perform thorough testing of creative assets across Connected TV (CTV) devices to ensure proper functionality, quality, and compliance with platform requirements

● Campaign Trafficking and QA: Effectively traffic and QA various campaign types, including CPM and CPCV, ensuring accurate setup and adherence to delivery goals.

● Boolean Logic Implementation: Proficient in applying Boolean logic (AND, OR statements) for precise targeting and effective campaign optimization

title: Estagio em Marketing
description:
Estágio em Marketing Estratégico e Conteúdo

Empresa: Be Intelligence

Local: Remoto


Sobre a Be Intelligence

Somos uma consultoria estratégica boutique dedicada a elevar o valor das marcas por meio do conhecimento humano e da compreensão de negócio. Atuamos com uma abordagem multidisciplinar e completa, oferecendo soluções que vão do diagnóstico à transformação.


Sobre a Vaga

Procuramos uma pessoa proativa, criativa e com vontade de aprender, para apoiar nossas frentes de marketing. Você terá a oportunidade de atuar de forma transversal em projetos de conteúdo, CRM, pesquisa e suporte estratégico - com a chance real de se desenvolver em diferentes frentes da comunicação e do marketing.


Responsabilidades

  • Apoiar na criação e execução de conteúdos para redes sociais (roteiro, copy e edição de vídeos).
  • Participar da elaboração de materiais estratégicos (apresentações, relatórios, propostas).
  • Auxiliar na estruturação e atualização de fluxos de CRM e e-mails marketing.
  • Realizar pesquisas e benchmarks para clientes e projetos internos.
  • Colaborar em ações de comunicação interna e institucional da Be Intelligence.
  • Acompanhar reuniões e contribuir com ideias e soluções criativas.


Requisitos

  • Estar cursando o primeiro ou segundo ano de Marketing, Comunicação, Design, Administração ou áreas correlatas.
  • Escrita criativa e boa capacidade de comunicação.
  • Organização, autonomia e vontade de aprender.
  • Conhecimento em Canva, CapCut, Photoshop ou similares.
  • Inglês intermediário.
  • Interesse em branding, tendências de comportamento, estratégia e inovação.


O que oferecemos

  • Estágio remoto com flexibilidade de horário.
  • Ambiente colaborativo, criativo e com muito aprendizado na prática.
  • Participação em projetos reais com grandes marcas e profissionais do mercado.
  • Bolsa auxílio compatível com o mercado.
  • Acesso a uma rede de profissionais experientes e apoio no seu desenvolvimento profissional.


Como se candidatar

Além de aplicar por aqui, envie seu currículo com um parágrafo contando por que gostaria de fazer parte da Be Intelligence para:

Nos acompanhe: @be.intelligence |

title: Power Bi Developer
description:
We are HCLTech, one of the world’s largest and fastest growing technology and DSA companies with over 227,000 professionals across 60 countries, driving progress through industry-leading capabilities focused on Digital, Engineering and Cloud.


The driving force behind this work, our people, is a diverse, creative and passionate audience that enables us to continually raise the bar for excellence in our services. We strive to empower each of our professionals to achieve their best, while also striving to help them find their daily inspiration and become the best version of themselves.


We are looking for a highly talented and self-motivated to join us on our journey to advance the world of technology through innovation and creativity.


Job Description:

  • Experience in Power BI Services and administration.
  • Good knowledge of Power BI report development, Power BI Services, Workspace, Access Management and Capacity Management.
  • Hands on experience in DAX and SQL.
  • Experience in handling tickets, incidents etc. through Service Now or any other tool.
  • Must have effective communication skills and should have worked with business and customers for their reporting requirements
  • To develop and deliver detailed solutions or products as per the requirements of the client within defined parameters of time and quality.


Why choose us?

We are one of the largest and fastest growing technology companies in the world, with offices in over 60 countries and 224,000 employees

Our company is extremely diverse with 165 nationalities represented

We offer the opportunity to work with colleagues from all over the world

We offer a virtual-first work environment, promoting a good integration between your work and personal life, with real flexibility

We are committed to your growth, offering learning and career development opportunities at all levels to help you find your unique brilliance. We offer comprehensive benefits to all employees

We are certified as a "Great Place to Work" and "Top Employer" in 17 countries, and recognized as a “Top Employer” in Brazil specifically, offering a positive work environment that values employee recognition and respect


Equality & Opportunity for All

Representing 165 nationalities worldwide, we are proud to be an equal opportunity employer committed to providing equal employment opportunities to all applicants and employees without regard to race, religion, sex, color, age, national origin, pregnancy, sexual orientation, disability or genetic information, or any other protected classification, in accordance with federal, state and/or local laws

title: Representante Comercial.
description:
A Fixxar Import está ampliando sua equipe e busca Representantes Comerciais em todo o Brasil para expandir sua atuação nos seguintes segmentos:


  • Embalagens
  • Papelaria
  • Armarinhos
  • Atacados e distribuidores
  • Material de escritório
  • Automação industrial


Requisitos:


  • Experiência comprovada nos segmentos mencionados.
  • Carteira ativa de clientes na região de atuação.
  • Experiência representando outras empresas nos segmentos descritos.

    • Informações a serem incluídas no currículo:


    • Lista das empresas que atualmente representa.
    • Tempo de atuação para cada uma dessas empresas.


    Se você possui um perfil comercial, mantém excelente relacionamento no mercado e deseja representar uma empresa com um portfólio consolidado de produtos de alta demanda, envie seu currículo. Venha fazer parte da Fixxar Import e contribua para o nosso crescimento!

title: Especialista de Segurança da Informação – Key User (Projeto DLP com Azure/Purview)
description:
Estamos em busca de um Especialista de Segurança da Informação para atuar como Key User em um projeto estratégico de Data Loss Prevention (DLP) , com foco no ecossistema Microsoft (Azure e Purview). Este profissional será o elo entre as áreas técnicas, o time de projeto e os usuários de negócio, garantindo que as melhores práticas de segurança sejam incorporadas desde o desenho até a operação da solução.


Responsabilidades:

  • Atuar como usuário-chave no projeto de implementação da solução de DLP.
  • Apoiar a definição e o mapeamento de políticas de proteção e classificação de dados sensíveis.
  • Trabalhar em conjunto com os times de segurança, governança, compliance e tecnologia para garantir alinhamento com normas internas e regulamentações externas (LGPD, GDPR etc.).
  • Conduzir análises de riscos e propor medidas corretivas/preventivas para proteção da informação.
  • Apoiar a configuração, testes e validação das ferramentas de DLP, com ênfase em Microsoft Purview e soluções de segurança no Azure.
  • Participar da definição de controles técnicos e funcionais baseados em boas práticas (como CIS Controls, NIST, ISO 27001).
  • Promover capacitação e engajamento dos usuários e áreas de negócio quanto ao uso das ferramentas de proteção de dados.


Requisitos:

  • Formação em Tecnologia da Informação, Engenharia, Segurança da Informação ou áreas correlatas.
  • Experiência comprovada em projetos de segurança da informação, especialmente em temas relacionados a DLP.
  • Conhecimento prático em soluções Microsoft, especialmente Azure Security , Microsoft Purview , Defender for Cloud , Information Protection e Compliance Center .
  • Familiaridade com frameworks de segurança como NIST , ISO 27001 , CIS Controls .
  • Conhecimentos sobre Data Governance , Classificação de Dados e Cibersegurança corporativa .
  • Boa comunicação, perfil colaborativo e capacidade de atuar como facilitador entre áreas técnicas e de negócio.


Diferenciais:

  • Certificações Microsoft (ex: SC-400, SC-200, AZ-500).
  • Conhecimento em ferramentas de CASB, SIEM e integração com soluções de identidade (Entra ID, antigo Azure AD).
  • Experiência anterior em projetos similares envolvendo proteção de dados e compliance regulatório.

title: Especialista de Segurança da Informação – Key User (Projeto DLP com Azure/Purview)

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
About the Company:


Ótmow is a financial platform to empower government suppliers with quick and accessible invoice financing. We understand the unique challenges faced by companies working in partnership with the government, from late payments to the need to comply with specific regulations. By providing working capital, Otmow helps its clients ensure the highest level of support and commitment to Brazilian cities. As a part of Otmow, you will shape our product and play a pivotal role in pioneering the development of a trailblazing financial product that has real-world impact to the country’s economy.



About the Role:


We’re looking for a Full Stack Software Engineer who enjoys building end-to-end features and working across the tech stack. You’ll be part of a fast-moving team focused on turning complex data into usable tools and insights. In this role, you’ll help us develop key product features such as a credit matrix, automated sales and marketing workflows, and internal metric dashboards. You’ll also contribute to gathering structured data from public transparency portals using modern web scraping techniques.



Responsibilities:


  • Build and maintain features using React (TypeScript) and Python (FastAPI or Flask)
  • Design and run web scraping jobs to extract structured data from public portals
  • Develop and integrate GCP-based infrastructure (Cloud Run, Firestore, Firebase Auth, etc.) and Supabase infrastructure (PostgresSQL)
  • Implement product features like credit matrices, automation tools, and metrics dashboards
  • Ensure data integrity and quality across systems
  • Participate in technical discussions, architecture, code reviews, and planning



Required Skills:


  • 2+ years of experience in full stack development
  • Solid working knowledge of TypeScript and React
  • Strong experience with Python and backend frameworks (e.g. FastAPI, Flask)
  • Solid understanding of web scraping (e.g. Playwright, BeautifulSoup, requests)
  • Familiarity with Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
  • Version control with Git and CI/CD pipelines
  • Ability to work independently and communicate clearly in a remote setup
  • Ability to work under Pessoa Jurídica (PJ) in Brazil
  • English: Advanced – able to read documentation, participate in technical discussions, and communicate clearly
  • Portuguese: Native – fluent in spoken and written communication, able to handle technical and business conversations with ease



Preferred Skills:


  • Experience scraping dynamic websites or handling anti-bot measures
  • Background in data-driven products or credit-related fintechs



Benefits:


  • Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses.
  • Early startup equity to share in the company's success.
  • Flexible work hours and the option for remote work.
  • Collaborative and dynamic work environment with a diverse team.



If you are enthusiastic about joining a fast-paced startup focused on innovation and real-world impact to the Brazilian economy, please apply as a Fullstack Engineer for Otmow. We’re looking to positively transform the lives of millions.

title: Medicaid Application Specialist
description:
We’re looking for an Application Specialist to join the team of one of our U.S.-based clients on a full-time basis.Our client is building a remote support team to assist patients in U.S. nursing facilities with preparing and processing long-term-care Medicaid applications . This is a critical and high-impact role that requires a balance of strong documentation skills and empathetic, professional communication.

The individuals on this team will ultimately become the backbone of our client’s success structure, with future leadership opportunities on the horizon. The next few months working on Medicaid applications will serve as a boot camp, providing intensive, hands-on experience that will overqualify them for future Client Success Specialist roles.


This is a remote-first role , but it will require U.S. business hours (Mountain Standard Time) and frequent phone calls. We're looking for highly reliable, professional, and fluent individuals who can represent us confidently to one of our most important enterprise clients.

title: Cloud Engineer - Azure
description:
We are looking for a Cloud Engineer to work together with our team members on our enterprise customer projects. This is a well-paid remote role that you can do from anywhere.


Responsibilities

  • Be part of a team managing and monitoring all deployed systems and infrastructure in our customer environments
  • Automate deployments on complex and custom software solutions
  • Proactively ensure the highest levels of systems and infrastructure availability
  • Monitor and test application performance for potential bottlenecks, identify possible solutions and work with developers to implement those fixes
  • Maintain security, backup, and redundancy strategies
  • Engage in design discussions together with internal and external stakeholders
  • Participate in pre-sale activities occasionally


Your profile

  • 5+ years of Azure experience
  • 3+ years of Terraform experience
  • 5+ years of Docker and Kubernetes experience
  • 2+ years of Ansible experience
  • 2+ years of GitOps experience
  • Understanding of Git-flow
  • Strong Systems Engineering background
  • Infrastructure and network security knowledge
  • “Automate everything”-mentality
  • Experience working on large-scale Azure projects
  • Deep knowledge of both Linux and Windows Server operating systems
  • Understanding of Identity and Access Management
  • Excellent English – written and verbal
  • Service-oriented and customer-centric mindset
  • Great level of autonomy


Nice to have

  • AWS experience.
  • Kubernetes Helm Chart development experience
  • Terraform Associate (Certification)
  • Azure AZ-104 (Certification)
  • Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) Certification



If this role excites you, but you are worried that you don't fit all the requirements, please send your application anyway. We would love to get in touch!

title: Cloud Engineer - Azure
description:
We are looking for a Cloud Engineer to work together with our team members on our enterprise customer projects. This is a well-paid remote role that you can do from anywhere.


Responsibilities

  • Be part of a team managing and monitoring all deployed systems and infrastructure in our customer environments
  • Automate deployments on complex and custom software solutions
  • Proactively ensure the highest levels of systems and infrastructure availability
  • Monitor and test application performance for potential bottlenecks, identify possible solutions and work with developers to implement those fixes
  • Maintain security, backup, and redundancy strategies
  • Engage in design discussions together with internal and external stakeholders
  • Participate in pre-sale activities occasionally


Your profile

  • 5+ years of Azure experience
  • 3+ years of Terraform experience
  • 5+ years of Docker and Kubernetes experience
  • 2+ years of Ansible experience
  • 2+ years of GitOps experience
  • Understanding of Git-flow
  • Strong Systems Engineering background
  • Infrastructure and network security knowledge
  • “Automate everything”-mentality
  • Experience working on large-scale Azure projects
  • Deep knowledge of both Linux and Windows Server operating systems
  • Understanding of Identity and Access Management
  • Excellent English – written and verbal
  • Service-oriented and customer-centric mindset
  • Great level of autonomy


Nice to have

  • AWS experience.
  • Kubernetes Helm Chart development experience
  • Terraform Associate (Certification)
  • Azure AZ-104 (Certification)
  • Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) Certification



If this role excites you, but you are worried that you don't fit all the requirements, please send your application anyway. We would love to get in touch!

title: Especialista em Front End
description:
A ACT Digital é uma multinacional brasileira e a segunda maior empresa de transformação digital do país. Com mais de 5.000 profissionais CLT, exportamos serviços para 12 países e oferecemos soluções tecnológicas sob medida. Atuamos na contratação de especialistas em TI para projetos estratégicos de empresas de grande porte, sempre com foco em inovação, excelência e geração de valor.


Estamos em busca de um(a) Especialista em Desenvolvedor(a) Front-End com sólida experiência em Angular e seu ecossistema. O(a) profissional ideal terá expertise em arquiteturas complexas, micro frontends, performance e construção de bibliotecas reutilizáveis.

title: Consultor Sênior de SAP TM – Embedded e Sidecar
description:
A Softtek está em busca de Consultor Sênior de SAP TM – Embedded e Sidecar para fazer parte do nosso quadro de colaboradores apoiando um de nossos grandes clientes.


Conhecimentos/Experiências que o profissional precisa ter:

  • Consultor SAP TM com experiência em S/4 HANA nos modelos Embedded e Sidecar.
  • Conhecimentos em: SAP S/4HANA TM, SAP TM 9.6, SAP ECC, SAP S/4HANA Core, SAP ABAP, Collaboration Portal e LBN (Logistics Business Network).
  • Experiência com dados mestres no SAP TM.
  • Vivência na gestão de pedidos SO/PO/STO para os processos P2P (Procure-to-Pay) e OTC (Order-to-Cash) .
  • Experiência em planejamento automático e manual, acordos de frete, cálculos de tarifas e liquidação de frete.
  • Integrações PI/PO entre SAP TM e S/4HANA.

Responsabilidades

  • Monitorar, analisar e resolver incidentes e solicitações de serviço relacionadas ao módulo SAP TM.
  • Investigar e solucionar problemas de configuração do sistema, integração e fluxos de dados.
  • Garantir a resolução rápida de problemas relatados por usuários e correções de falhas do sistema.
  • Realizar manutenção de rotina no sistema, incluindo atualizações, ajustes de configuração e otimização de desempenho.
  • Apoiar testes e implementação de upgrades, correções (patches) e melhorias no sistema.
  • Assegurar a documentação adequada das configurações e mudanças no sistema.

Suporte ao Usuário e Treinamento

  • Atuar como ponto de contato principal para os usuários finais, oferecendo orientação sobre funcionalidades do SAP TM e melhores práticas.
  • Conduzir treinamentos e produzir documentação de usuário para aumentar a eficiência e autonomia dos usuários.
  • Coletar feedback dos usuários e sugerir melhorias no sistema.

Colaboração com Equipes

  • Trabalhar em conjunto com as áreas de negócio para entender os requisitos operacionais e garantir o alinhamento do sistema.
  • Coordenar com as equipes funcionais e técnicas de SAP para suporte e integração entre módulos.
  • Apoiar na escalada de incidentes para a SAP ou fornecedores externos, quando necessário.

Relatórios e Análises

  • Gerar e analisar relatórios do sistema para monitorar o desempenho e o uso.
  • Identificar padrões de problemas recorrentes e propor ações preventivas.
  • Fornecer atualizações regulares e relatórios de status à gestão e demais partes interessadas.

Idiomas Necessários:

  • Inglês avançado.


Tempo de alocação: Indeterminado

Tipo de alocação: Remoto

Horário: Segunda a sexta-feira, das 08h às 17h

title: Multi-platform Ads Specialist
description:
We are hiring: Multi-platform Ads Specialist


Do you have a passion for data and digital advertising? Are you experienced in running campaigns across platforms like Facebook, Google, TikTok, and more? If yes, we’d love to meet you.


About the Role

As a Multi-platform Ads Specialist, you will be responsible for planning, executing, optimizing, and reporting on paid campaigns across various digital platforms to support our business and client growth goals.


Key Responsibilities

  • Plan and manage paid ad campaigns on platforms such as Facebook Ads, Google Ads, TikTok Ads, Zalo Ads, and others
  • Analyze campaign data and performance to provide actionable insights and optimization strategies
  • Collaborate with content, design, and development teams to ensure ad effectiveness
  • Stay updated on industry trends and experiment with new ad formats and strategies


Requirements

  • 1–2 years of experience managing multi-platform paid ads
  • Solid understanding of performance metrics such as CTR, CPA, ROAS, etc.
  • Strong analytical skills and experience with tools like Google Analytics or similar
  • Growth mindset with adaptability to new platforms and changes
  • Experience in (Retail/Fashion/Education/Tech) industry is a plus


What We Offer

  • Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses
  • A young, dynamic, and creative working environment
  • Opportunities to work with a wide range of clients and industries
  • Access to training and professional development support

#Hiring #DigitalMarketing #PerformanceMarketing #AdsSpecialist #FacebookAds #GoogleAds #TikTokAds #MarketingCareers

description:

Do you have a passion for data and digital advertising? Are you experienced in running campaigns across platforms like Facebook, Google, TikTok, and more? If yes, we’d love to meet you.


About the Role

As a Multi-platform Ads Specialist, you will be responsible for planning, executing, optimizing, and reporting on paid campaigns across various digital platforms to support our business and client growth goals.


Key Responsibilities

  • Plan and manage paid ad campaigns on platforms such as Facebook Ads, Google Ads, TikTok Ads, Zalo Ads, and others
  • Analyze campaign data and performance to provide actionable insights and optimization strategies
  • Collaborate with content, design, and development teams to ensure ad effectiveness
  • Stay updated on industry trends and experiment with new ad formats and strategies


Requirements

  • 1–2 years of experience managing multi-platform paid ads
  • Solid understanding of performance metrics such as CTR, CPA, ROAS, etc.
  • Strong analytical skills and experience with tools like Google Analytics or similar
  • Growth mindset with adaptability to new platforms and changes
  • Experience in (Retail/Fashion/Education/Tech) industry is a plus


What We Offer

  • Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses
  • A young, dynamic, and creative working environment
  • Opportunities to work with a wide range of clients and industries
  • Access to training and professional development support

#Hiring #DigitalMarketing #PerformanceMarketing #AdsSpecialist #FacebookAds #GoogleAds #TikTokAds #MarketingCareers

title: Staff Software Engineer
description:
Sync is a personal assistant for diabetes that helps people make the best decisions by unifying health data and making daily management more practical, faster, and more accurate. Our app consolidates glucose measurements, insulin injections, carb counting, and many other health metrics in one place.


We are a small, early-stage startup of 10 experienced people looking for a Staff Software Engineer to help lead and scale our technology.


What You’ll Do


Architect and Develop - Work with our NestJS backend, Flutter mobile app, and Google Cloud infrastructure to deliver a robust, high-quality product.


Observability & Monitoring - Set up and maintain monitoring and alerting with Sentry (for errors) and Grafana (for infrastructure), ensuring performance and reliability.


Technical Leadership - Define best practices, lead code reviews, guide system architecture decisions, and maintain a high bar for code quality and performance.


Process & Team Growth - Proactively improve development processes (CI/CD, Agile workflows), support hiring, and help define on-call procedures.


Ownership & Autonomy - Drive initiatives from ideation to production, influencing the tech culture and strategic direction of the company.


What We’re Looking For


Extensive Experience - Proven track record in a senior/staff engineering role, preferably in startup or scale-up environments.


Adaptability & Learning : Comfortable learning new technologies and frameworks quickly. While we use NestJS, Flutter, and Google Cloud, we value strong fundamentals more than specific framework knowledge.


Monitoring & Observability - Comfortable with tools like Grafana, Sentry, and other metrics/logging solutions.


Leadership & Communication - History of mentoring engineers, improving team processes, and collaborating cross-functionally.


Proactive & Collaborative - Able to identify challenges, propose solutions, and rally the team toward common goals.


What We Offer


Remote-First - Work from anywhere with flexibility in schedules.


Competitive Compensation - Attractive salary package plus equity .


Growth Opportunities - Be part of an early-stage startup where you can directly impact product and culture.


Meaningful Work - Help build a solution that genuinely improves the lives of people living with diabetes.


Supportive Culture - A collaborative environment that values initiative, ownership, and continuous learning.

title: Senior Frontend Developer
description:
Estamos procurando por front-end engineers part-time com experience com OpenAI API e solido conhecimento em React and Next.js.


Estamos desenvolvendo um aplicativo de AI que permite a influenciadores e criadores subir vídeos do YouTube, PDFs, áudios e imagens em um só lugar para criar uma versão em AI de si mesmos, com a qual seus seguidores poderão interagir.


**Requisitos obrigatórios:

* Experiência sólida com React.js e Next.js

* Experiência com SDKs de IA e integração com modelos como GPT-4, Claude, etc.

* Experiência com TypeScript

* Familiaridade com Supabase, Firebase ou tecnologias de banco de dados similares


**Desejável:

* Experiência com GraphQL, WebSocket, REST

* Conhecimento em processamento de vídeo/áudio em aplicações web

* Experiência com ferramentas de colaboração em tempo real como Liveblocks/PartyKit e React Flow

* Conhecimento em Web Components


**Experiência profissional:

* 5+ anos de experiência relevante com programação Frontend

* Histórico comprovado no desenvolvimento e escalonamento de aplicações web


**Visto e vaga full-time:

Se você for um profissional de alto desempenho e superar nossas expectativas, existe a possibilidade de oferecermos uma vaga full-time. Também oferecemos visto de trabalho e Green Card caso tenha interesse em se mudar para os Estados Unidos. Pagamos em dolares ou reais.

title: Calypso Functional FO-MO
description:
Project Description:

Luxoft has one of the world's leading Calypso practices.

We are a top-tier Calypso Partner and a market leader in implementation, integration, upgrade, and migration.

We provide end-to-end project services and have delivered Calypso projects across all major asset classes and sectors including investment banking, asset management, corporate treasury, and insurance.


Project Description:

Support and additional build out (projects) for Calypso instance.


Responsibilities:

- Address and respond to production support issues and trouble shoot issues arising from day-to-day activities Calypso instance

- Provide support to FO and MO users on Calypso

- Configure, updated, optimize functional set up in Calypso

- Execute (where required) SOD/ EOD Scheduled Tasks

- Develop necessary functional solutions for Calypso instance as per requirements (if required)

- Monitor if market quotes fail to update Calypso system error messages

- Monitor feed & security definitions download, if reprocessing of trades needed or reprocessing of events

- Ensures supporting documents are complete, current, and appropriately stored

- Works closely with relevant business and technology stakeholders to ensure effective and efficient implementation of the project(s)

- Submits status reports to stakeholders; coordinates and provides updates to steering committees

- Collaboration with key functional or business stakeholders to achieve clear outcomes/deliverables in relation to the strategic and transformational book of work

- Manage deliverables ensuring transparency of risks, issues and dependencies that are fully aligned to functional / business owners


You might be acting also as a business analyst as well in order to help the team gathering and writing requirements, acceptance criteria.


A Sampling of Tasks Expected to be Performed:

1. Configuring Standard & Custom Interfaces within Calypso

2. Setting up Quote Feeds from Bloomberg

3. Set-up Holiday Calendar feed

4. Set-up Interest Rate Curves & other market data

5. Set-up Dividend Curves for Custom Index

6. Set-up Equity Volatility Surface feeds

7. Translate Historical Volatility of Volatility-controlled indexes to a Volatility Surface to be used in Calypso

8. Set-up pricing configuration & pricing parameters

9. Some end-of-day processing/monitoring needed


Skills Description:

• 3+ years of experience working in Capital Markets and Calypso

• Good knowledge of Financial products cross assets

- Expertise with a front-to-back Calypso derivatives solution, including accounting, is a must. Preferably with an insurance

industry focus.


Other Required Skills:

- Ability to work with little supervision, be a fast learner, self-motivated, team player, and collaborator with strong problem-solving

skills.

- Must be resourceful and demonstrate initiative in getting the job done.

- Good oral and written communication skills are essential.


- Ability to train and transfer knowledge to Guardian's business and technology stakeholders

• Proven track record of delivery of implementation / migration projects

• Proven experience in the development of Calypso integrations, reporting, and other technical aspects

- Experience of adherence to governance frameworks / implementation and handover to BAU

• Comprehensive knowledge of trade flow, trading systems and related concepts and technology, including valuation and client/market risk management

• Leadership skills

• Excellent analytical skills, understanding of project life cycles, and ability to act in an entrepreneurial manner to ensure the requirements from the business are gathered in the appropriate manner.

• Proven analytical, planning, problem solving and decision-making skills

• Comfortable with direct communication with all levels of technical and business resources

• Excellent organizational and time management skills with the ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously

• Experience with working in a highly collaborative and dynamic multi-team environment

title: Software Engineer
description:
Joing FlyingPenguins as a software engineer


Are you a skilled, driven engineer passionate about creating meaningful online learning experiences? Want to shape how individuals and teams develop critical collaboration skills in the workplace? Then come soar with us at FlyingPenguins !


Who we are

At FlyingPenguins, we’re revolutionizing collaboration through AI-enabled, facilitator-led learning experiences . Our research-backed, interactive platform helps individuals and teams improve how they collaborate—making real change in modern workplaces.


We’re now building our core online platform , the heart of our learning ecosystem, and we need your help to make it exceptional.


What you will do

As a Software Engineer, you’ll play a key role in designing, scaling, and evolving our learning platform. You’ll:


  • Design and develop our online platform for DISC assessments, simulations, and training resources.
  • Work across the full stack—from engaging UIs to robust APIs .
  • Collaborate closely with product, design, and engineering teams.
  • Integrate features for DISC assessment delivery and visualization.
  • Build systems to deliver learning content and track progress.
  • Architect AI-powered simulations for real-world collaboration practice.
  • Write testable, well-documented code, and participate in code reviews.
  • Improve and operate our Kubernetes-based infrastructure.
  • Monitor system health and respond proactively.
  • Work with LLM APIs to deliver personalized, AI-assisted guidance.


What you bring

We're looking for someone who is both technical and mission-driven , with:


  • Proficiency in React , Shadcn UI , and Redux Toolkit .
  • Strong backend skills in Python/FastAPI and Go .
  • Experience with PostgreSQL (or similar relational DBs).
  • Comfort working with prompting/fine-tuning LLMs .
  • Solid grasp of software engineering best practices.
  • Great problem-solving and communication skills.
  • Ability to work independently in a collaborative team.


Bonus points

  • Experience with LMS platforms or online education tools.
  • Familiarity with authoring systems and access control.
  • Data visualization experience.
  • Contributions to open-source projects.
  • A genuine passion for education, teamwork, and continuous learning.


What we offer

  • Mission-driven work with real-world impact.
  • Growth at the intersection of AI and education .
  • A modern, high-leverage tech stack with space for creativity.
  • A curious, supportive, and diverse team.


Ready to soar?

If you're excited about building the future of collaborative learning and want to empower individuals and teams to thrive together, we want to hear from you !


Send your resume and a short cover letter to:

We're looking for someone who is both technical and mission-driven , with:


  • Proficiency in React , Shadcn UI , and Redux Toolkit .
  • Strong backend skills in Python/FastAPI and Go .
  • Experience with PostgreSQL (or similar relational DBs).
  • Comfort working with prompting/fine-tuning LLMs .
  • Solid grasp of software engineering best practices.
  • Great problem-solving and communication skills.
  • Ability to work independently in a collaborative team.


Bonus points

  • Experience with LMS platforms or online education tools.
  • Familiarity with authoring systems and access control.
  • Data visualization experience.
  • Contributions to open-source projects.
  • A genuine passion for education, teamwork, and continuous learning.


What we offer

  • Mission-driven work with real-world impact.
  • Growth at the intersection of AI and education .
  • A modern, high-leverage tech stack with space for creativity.
  • A curious, supportive, and diverse team.


Ready to soar?

If you're excited about building the future of collaborative learning and want to empower individuals and teams to thrive together, we want to hear from you !


Send your resume and a short cover letter to:

title: Senior PPC Campaign Manager
description:
We’re Hiring: Google Ads Expert (Remote | U.S. Market | Home Improvement Niche)

We are a results-driven digital marketing agency looking for an experienced Google Ads specialist to join our remote team .

If you have a strong track record generating leads in the U.S. Home Improvement space (roofing, remodeling, HVAC, etc.) – we’d love to connect.

Role Overview:
  • Position : Google Ads Expert
  • Location : Remote
  • Niche : Home Improvement (U.S. market)
  • Type : Freelance / Part-time, with growth potential
What We're Looking For:
  • Minimum 3 years of experience managing Google Ads campaigns (Search, Display, YouTube, Performance Max)
  • Proven success in lead generation for U.S.-based clients in the home services sector
  • Strong analytical skills and familiarity with conversion tracking, A/B testing, audience targeting, and bidding strategies
  • Experience in ad copywriting and funnel optimization
  • Excellent communication skills, self-discipline, and accountability
Responsibilities:
  • Plan, launch, and manage ad campaigns for U.S. home service clients
  • Analyze and optimize performance based on KPIs (CPL, ROAS, lead quality)
  • Collaborate with our internal creative and strategy team
  • Provide clear reporting and performance insights
To Apply:

Please send:

  • Your resume or LinkedIn profile
  • Campaign portfolio or performance screenshots
  • A short message highlighting your experience with U.S. home improvement campaigns

title: RECEPCIONISTA CRC LAURO DE FREITAS
description:
VAGA ABERTA: Consultor de Relacionamento com o Cliente (CRC)


Descrição da Empresa : Clinica Odontológica

Descrição do Cargo Estamos em busca de um Recepcionista para se juntar à nossa equipe na Villas Dental em Lauro de Freitas, BA. Este cargo envolve a realização de tarefas diárias como atendimento telefônico, recepção de pacientes, agendamento de consultas e organização de documentos administrativos. O candidato ideal deve garantir uma excelente experiência aos clientes desde a chegada até a saída. Este é um cargo de tempo integral e requer presença no local.

Qualificações

  • Etiqueta Telefônica: Necessário possuir habilidades em atendimento telefônico profissional para garantir comunicação clara e cortês com os clientes.
  • Atividades de Recepção: Experiência em recepção de pacientes e visitantes, agendamento de consultas e em fornecer informações precisas e úteis.
  • Habilidades Clericais: Capacidade de gerenciar atividades administrativas, como organização de documentos e gestão de correspondências.
  • Serviço ao Cliente: Habilidades comprovadas de atendimento ao cliente para garantir uma experiência positiva e satisfatória aos pacientes.
  • Serão considerados diferenciais conhecimentos em sistemas de gestão odontológicos e fluência em mais de um idioma.


Se você tem experiência em Vendas ou telemarketing , é comunicativo(a) e gosta de trabalhar com atendimento ao cliente, essa oportunidade é para você.

Principais Responsabilidades

✅Entrar em contato com leads vindos da internet e promover agendamento.

✅Realizar vendas e negociações por telefone.

✅Identificar as necessidades dos clientes e apresentar soluções personalizadas.

✅Realizar follow-ups para garantir a satisfação e fidelização dos clientes.

✅Registrar informações relevantes sobre os atendimentos.

✅Perfil proativo, organizado e focado em metas e resultados.


Requisitos

Experiência comprovada em consultório odontológico.

Boa comunicação e habilidades interpessoais.


Como se candidatar?

 WhatsApp para o número: (71) 99309-1118 e email

  • Venha fazer parte do nosso time

title: Java Software Engineer
description:
About Ascendion

Ascendion is a full-service digital engineering solutions company. We make and manage software platforms and products that power growth and deliver captivating experiences to consumers and employees. Our engineering, cloud, data, experience design, and talent solution capabilities accelerate transformation and impact for enterprise clients. Headquartered in New Jersey, our workforce of 6,000+ Ascenders delivers solutions from around the globe. Ascendion is built differently to engineer the next.

Ascendion | Engineering to elevate life

We have a culture built on opportunity, inclusion, and a spirit of partnership. Come, change the world with us:

  • Build the coolest tech for world’s leading brands
  • Solve complex problems – and learn new skills
  • Experience the power of transforming digital engineering for Fortune 500 clients
  • Master your craft with leading training programs and hands-on experience

Experience a community of change makers!

Join a culture of high-performing innovators with endless ideas and a passion for tech. Our culture is the fabric of our company, and it is what makes us unique and diverse. The way we share ideas, learning, experiences, successes, and joy allows everyone to be their best at Ascendion.

About the Role:


Role: Software Engineers Java

Location: LATAM

Employment Type: Contract


Job Summary:

Responsibilities :

  • Proficient in search and data processing systems using Elastic, Spring Framework, Kafka, event-driven processing and API’s.
  • Optimize and scale search and data processing infrastructure to handle growing data volumes and user requests
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
  • Follow best practices for data indexing, search optimization, and data integrity
  • Monitor system performance, troubleshoot issues, and ensure high availability and reliability
  • Participate in code reviews and contribute to a high standard of code quality
  • Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies to ensure our systems remain cutting-edge


Qualifications :

  • Bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field
  • 5+ years of professional software engineering experience
  • Proven experience with Elasticsearch and other search technologies
  • Strong proficiency in Java and experience with Java batch processing
  • Hands-on experience with Kafka and distributed messaging systems
  • Solid understanding of data structures, algorithms, and software design principles
  • Experience with cloud platforms and infrastructure (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure)
  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines, containerization (Docker, Kubernetes, PCF, AKS), and microservices architecture
  • Excellent attention to detail
  • Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment


Tell us about your experiences, education, and ambitions. Bring your knowledge, unique viewpoint, and creativity to the table. Let’s talk!

Experience a community of change makers!

Join a culture of high-performing innovators with endless ideas and a passion for tech. Our culture is the fabric of our company, and it is what makes us unique and diverse. The way we share ideas, learning, experiences, successes, and joy allows everyone to be their best at Ascendion.

About the Role:


Role: Software Engineers Java

Location: LATAM

Employment Type: Contract


Job Summary:

Responsibilities :

  • Proficient in search and data processing systems using Elastic, Spring Framework, Kafka, event-driven processing and API’s.
  • Optimize and scale search and data processing infrastructure to handle growing data volumes and user requests
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
  • Follow best practices for data indexing, search optimization, and data integrity
  • Monitor system performance, troubleshoot issues, and ensure high availability and reliability
  • Participate in code reviews and contribute to a high standard of code quality
  • Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies to ensure our systems remain cutting-edge


Qualifications :

  • Bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field
  • 5+ years of professional software engineering experience
  • Proven experience with Elasticsearch and other search technologies
  • Strong proficiency in Java and experience with Java batch processing
  • Hands-on experience with Kafka and distributed messaging systems
  • Solid understanding of data structures, algorithms, and software design principles
  • Experience with cloud platforms and infrastructure (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure)
  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines, containerization (Docker, Kubernetes, PCF, AKS), and microservices architecture
  • Excellent attention to detail
  • Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment


Tell us about your experiences, education, and ambitions. Bring your knowledge, unique viewpoint, and creativity to the table. Let’s talk!

title: Lead Software Developer - React Native
description:
Responsibilities:

You will be implementing new features and enhancing existing functionalities on client applications to support streaming video products. This includes estimation, design, development, testing, and documentation.

Lead the Software Engineering Team and collaborate with product managers, and architects in a cross functional environment to ensure functions and performance meet customer requirements in a cost effective and maintainable way.

Provide on-call support including monitoring, triaging and resolving production issues


Mandatory Skills Description:

- Experience with agile development

- Good verbal/written communication skills

- At least 2-3 years of Team Leadership experience

- Strong teamwork focus and the ability to foster collaboration within and across teams

- Skilled at React Native mobile app development (5+ years) as well as at least one of the following

- Java/Kotlin or Obj-C/Swift

- Streaming mobile app development experience with iOS/Android and TV Platforms.


Languages:

English: C1 Advanced

title: Senior Data Analytics
description:
A Jusfy está em busca de um Senior Data Analytics para compor o time! Somos uma startup jurídica que busca constantemente soluções para facilitar a vida dos advogados e advogadas brasileiros. Atuamos na área de tecnologia, desenvolvendo produtos e ferramentas que auxiliam na produtividade diária dos nossos clientes.


Somos uma empresa jovem e muito promissora. Alcançamos resultados expressivos de crescimento nos últimos anos e sabemos que temos ainda muito mais para conquistar. Buscamos profissionais que queiram fazer parte dessa trajetória junto conosco!

O profissional será responsável por transformar dados complexos em informações estratégicas, gerando insights que apoiarão a tomada de decisões em várias áreas da empresa, incluindo finanças, clientes e software.


Principais Responsabilidades:

  • Analisar, estrategicamente, dados: Conduzir análises quantitativas e qualitativas aprofundadas sobre dados financeiros, comportamentais e operacionais, identificando tendências, gargalos e oportunidades de otimização.
  • Gerar valor e insights acionáveis: Transformar dados brutos em recomendações claras e impactantes que otimizem processos, melhorem a tomada de decisões e contribuam diretamente para os resultados de negócio da Jusfy.
  • Automatizar e otimizar: Desenvolver e implementar scripts e pipelines para automatizar a coleta, processamento e análise de dados, garantindo eficiência e escalabilidade das nossas operações.
  • Desenvolver soluções de BI: Criar e manter dashboards, relatórios e visualizações de dados intuitivos para diferentes stakeholders, utilizando ferramentas como Power BI, Metabase ou Tableau, garantindo que os dados sejam acessíveis e compreendidos.
  • Trabalhar lado a lado com as equipes de Finanças, Marketing, Produto e Desenvolvimento, entendendo suas necessidades de dados e construindo soluções personalizadas que apoiem seus objetivos.
  • Dominar os KPIs do SaaS: Aplicar profundo conhecimento em indicadores chave de performance (KPIs) específicos para o modelo de Software as a Service (SaaS).


Requisitos:

  • Formação Acadêmica: Graduação em Ciência da Computação, Estatística, Matemática, Engenharia, Economia ou áreas correlatas.
  • Experiência de pelo menos 3 anos como Analista de Dados ou em atividade similar, com vivência em transformação de dados em automação e resultados de negócio, preferencialmente com foco em dados financeiros, de clientes e de software.
  • Domínio de SQL para manipulação e consulta de dados, e experiência com Python ou R para análise, automação e desenvolvimento de modelos.
  • Experiência com ferramentas de visualização de dados como Power BI, Metabase, Tableau ou similares.
  • Conhecimento prático em bancos de dados relacionais (ex.: Postgres) e não relacionais (ex.: MongoDB).
  • Capacidade de identificar problemas, propor soluções baseadas em dados e implementá-las de forma autônoma.
  • Habilidade para traduzir análises complexas em insights claros e concisos para diferentes públicos.


Desejável:

  • Experiência prévia em ambiente SaaS;
  • Conhecimento de governança de dados


Modelo de Contratação: PJ


Oferecemos:

  • Cartão flexível de benefícios;
  • Bônus (Participação nos Resultados);
  • Day Off de aniversário;
  • Descanso remunerado;
  • Rotina remota de trabalho;
  • Ambiente de trabalho descontraído e inovador;
  • Oportunidade de trabalhar em projetos desafiadores e com grande impacto.


Como se candidatar

Valorizamos perspectivas diversas e incentivamos a candidatura de pessoas com diferentes experiências. Se você é uma pessoa Analista de Dados Sênior e está buscando uma oportunidade desafiadora em uma empresa inovadora, se aplique na vaga!
